situation: My son has bipolar disorder and he is only 9. He has delusions and has lost his mind for a month now

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: It's understandable to feel such pressure when it comes to your son's health. One approach could be to weigh the potential benefits and risks of both options. Have you had a chance to discuss your concerns with his doctor to get more insight? This might help you feel more confident in your decision.
